Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.strings

Class AsciiArt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.strings.AsciiArt
  • public class AsciiArt
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to create "ASCII art", including:
    • Banners
    • Lines
    • Boxes
    • Bulleted lists
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
